thread.title: Jake Gyllenhaal Wears 'Women Are Powerful & Dangerous' Button at Women's March, Joins Helen Mirren & More!
thread.title_full: Jake Gyllenhaal Wears 'Women Are Powerful & Dangerous' Button at Women's March, Joins Helen Mirren & More!

author: Just Jared
title: Jake Gyllenhaal Wears 'Women Are Powerful & Dangerous' Button at Women's March, Joins Helen Mirren & More!
text:
Jake Gyllenhaal wore his support on his chest at the 2017 Women’s March !
The 36-year-old actor was spotted listening to speakers at the Women’s March on Saturday (January 21) in Washington, D.C.
PHOTOS: Check out the latest pics of Jake Gyllenhaal 
He rocked two buttons on his jacket, one reading “Women Are Powerful and Dangerous” and the other displaying the phrase “Deeds Not Words.”
He was joined in the rallying by Helen Mirren , Whoopi Goldberg , and Cynthia Nixon . Head to our gallery to see all the pics!
The march is believed to be one of the largest-ever demonstrations in the history of the United States.
